title: To-Do List – Google Apps Script
description: A basic To-Do List application developed using Google Apps Script to practice task management and core Apps Script fundamentals.
longDescription: This To-Do List application is built using Google Apps Script with Google Drive as the backend for handling task-related data.
The system allows users to create, view, and manage daily tasks through a simple and intuitive web interface.
The project focuses on understanding task management workflows, client-side scripting, and Apps Script-based web app deployment.
This project was developed as a practice application to strengthen knowledge of Google Apps Script, JavaScript logic, and basic UI development.

title: Purchase Order Management System
description: A basic Purchase Order Management System developed for practice purposes to manage purchase orders and vendor data digitally.
longDescription: The Purchase Order Management System is a lightweight application built using Google Apps Script and Google Sheets as a cloud-based backend.
The system enables users to create purchase orders, manage vendor details, and view purchase order records through a simple web interface.
All purchase order and vendor data is stored in Google Sheets, allowing easy access, persistence, and basic tracking without a traditional database.
This project was developed to practice Google Apps Script automation and to understand fundamental system workflows related to purchase order management.

title: Visit Sri Lanka – Tourism Website
description: A modern tourism website developed to promote Sri Lanka by showcasing cultural heritage, natural attractions, and popular destinations through a responsive and user-friendly interface.
longDescription: Visit Sri Lanka is a personal frontend web project designed to promote tourism in Sri Lanka for both local and international travelers.
The website highlights cultural and historical landmarks, natural attractions, and tourist-friendly destinations across the island.
Built with ReactJS and Tailwind CSS, the project emphasizes modern UI design, mobile-first responsiveness, and clean component-based layouts.
This project was developed to strengthen frontend development skills, responsive design practices, and building fast, lightweight React applications.

title: Inventory Management System
description: A basic Inventory Management System built for practice purposes to manage items and stock records digitally.
longDescription: This To-Do List application is built using Google Apps Script and Google Sheets as a lightweight backend, allowing users to create, update, and delete daily tasks efficiently.
The application focuses on simplicity and performance, making it ideal for users who want a fast and minimal task management solution without complex setup.
Task data is stored securely within Google Sheets, ensuring easy accessibility, persistence, and basic data tracking without requiring a traditional database.
This project was developed to strengthen practical knowledge of AppScript automation, JavaScript-based UI handling, and spreadsheet-driven application logic.

title: SanthushEk – Portfolio Website
description: My personal portfolio website showcasing web development, research, and full-stack projects. Frontend-only React application with a modern, responsive design.
longDescription: SanthushEk – Portfolio Website is my personal frontend project designed to present my professional profile, technical skills, and completed projects in a clean and modern format.
The application is built as a frontend-only React project using Vite for fast development and optimized builds, ensuring excellent performance and responsiveness across all devices.
The site showcases more than 10 projects, each with detailed descriptions, technology stacks, live demo links, and GitHub repositories for easy exploration.
Interactive user experience is enhanced using Framer Motion animations, providing smooth transitions and engaging visual feedback without compromising performance.
The project follows a mobile-first design approach with Tailwind CSS, making it fully responsive and suitable for static deployment platforms such as Vercel or Netlify.
This portfolio serves as a central hub to demonstrate my expertise in modern web development, UI/UX design principles, and frontend engineering best practices.

title: MP-CHEM.lk
description: A full-featured educational platform including a public-facing website built with React and a robust Learning Management System (LMS).License © Silicon Radon Networks (Pvt) Ltd.
longDescription: MP-CHEM is an educational platform consisting of two main components: a React-based public website and a Laravel-based Learning Management System (LMS).
The public website provides information about courses, programs, and the institution, focusing on performance and user experience.
The LMS manages students, courses, instructors, and learning content, including administrative and student panels, supporting academic workflows and reporting.
Built with modern web technologies, the system incorporates role-based access control, MVC architecture, REST APIs, and scalable deployment practices.
As a Core Developer, I contributed to both frontend and backend development, system design, feature implementation, bug fixing, and optimization while collaborating with the internal team.

title: HillCity Advertising
description: A modern, interactive web application for HillCity Advertising, showcasing services, events, brand activations, and contact information with responsive design and smooth animations.
longDescription: HillCity Advertising is a professional React-based web application for a leading outdoor advertising agency in Kandy, built to highlight services, sustainability projects, and brand activations.
The platform emphasizes responsive design, engaging animations using Framer Motion, and a visually appealing UI optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Key features include detailed service showcases, events & promotions sections, a contact page with Google Maps integration, social media links, and fully functional navbar & footer components.
This project demonstrates advanced frontend development skills, modern React component structuring, animation integration, and production-ready deployment practices.

title: Patient-Centric Healthcare Management System (HMS)
description: A research-based patient-centric Healthcare Management System (HMS) designed to digitize hospital workflows in Sri Lanka, with secure blockchain-based authentication and cloud-ready architecture.
longDescription: This HMS was developed as part of a university final-year research project (Grade: A), focusing on patient-centric care, secure hospital policy enforcement, and blockchain-based login for digital transformation in Sri Lanka's healthcare sector.
The system addresses gaps in government hospitals that rely on paper-based or partially digital processes, providing improved data integrity, operational efficiency, and trust.
Key features include patient dashboards, role-based access control, hospital policy enforcement, digital medical records, and a scalable cloud architecture deployable on AWS.
The project demonstrates a proof-of-concept for nationwide digitization, highlighting how blockchain can enhance security and trust while maintaining a patient-centric design.
